rpc.datagen
Class Parameterization

java.lang.Object
  rpc.datagen.Parameterization

public class Parameterization
extends java.lang.Object

Parameterization of a causal model structure. Contains conditional probability tables for attributes and connector objects and link means for structure (i.e., relationships).

          Initialize a new paramterization object.

getLinkMeans

public java.util.Map<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>,java.lang.Double> getLinkMeans(VertexData vd)
Get the link means for each configuration of parent values associated with a particular structural variable.

Parameters:
vd - the vertex data object for the structural variable.
Returns:
a map from parent value configurations to link means associated with the structural variable. These will be used as the means for a Poisson connector for the corresponding relationship.
